description: - Meta Router for creating a shell app that loads micro frontends (aka routed applications or child apps) using iframes - Because of the usage of iframes the micro frontends are isolated and cannot influence each other in an unplanned way.  - Allows using different frameworks in different versions for the loaded micro frontends. - iframes are created at runtime - Allows jumping to a specific route within a child app - Synchronizing child app's routes with the shell's route - Resizes the iframes to prevent a scrollbar within the iframe - Tested with Hash-based routing - Tested w/ Chrome, Firefox, Edge and IE 11 (IE needs polyfills) - Allows Angular-like Aux-Routes to show several micro frontends side by side at one time
name: meta-spa-router
